title: Elegant Emerald and Diamond Gundla Mala Haaram
features: This exquisite necklace reimagines the traditional Gundla Mala with a modern sensibility. It features a graduating row of interconnected gold links adorned with dazzling diamonds. A central floral motif, studded with a prominent Emerald and diamonds, serves as the focal point. Delicate ruby accents adds a touch of traditional color. The design is inspired by Mughal patterns with a touch of temple jewelry influence.
occasions: and special festive occasions (pandugalu). Also suitable for high-end parties or galas where a touch of South Indian elegance is desired.
description: This unique necklace seamlessly blends traditional South Indian design with contemporary aesthetics. The use of high-quality emeralds, diamonds, and 22K gold ensures lasting value and brilliance. The Hyderabad polish gives the gold a radiant shine, adding to its allure. It's a statement piece that reflects both heritage and modern style, making it a cherished addition to any jewelry collection.
